name: Angie
description:
Angie is art-to-wear on your shoulder! A generous-sized, beautiful messenger bag, she is hand-crafted from reclaimed leathers in various blues and blacks that were selected from thrift-store finds. Several central panels were hand-painted and finished before sewing. This bag is roomy enough to hold a full day’s essentials, yet elegant on the arm. The strap is comfortable for every day use. The soft leather exterior is constructed with a generous pocket in front.

A true one-of-a-kind bag, Angie is fully lined with a brightly painted, natural cotton, and includes an inner pocket for small items or cell phone.

Dimensions:
Strap
Length: 30"
Width: 3"

Body
Height: 14"
Width: 18"
Depth: 3"

Inside pocket
Width 5"
Height 4"

name: Bodie Island totes
description:
Bodie Island totes are art-to-wear on your shoulder! Each is a generous sized tote bag, hand-crafted from acrylic paintings on canvas, with deep exterior pockets front and back. This is the bag for a day of errands. The Bodie Island tote is roomy enough to hold a full day’s essentials, yet elegant on the arm. The straps have a comfortable drop for all day use. A true one-of-a-kind bag, each Bodie Island tote is fully lined with a brightly painted, natural cotton, and includes an inner pocket for small items or cell phone.

Please specify blue or purple when ordering. Other color pairings may be ordered.

Dimensions:
Strap
Length: 32"
Width: 2.5"

Body
Height: 15"
Width: 15"
Depth: 3.5"

Inside pocket
Width: 5"
Height: 4"

name: Pamlico petite totes
description:
Pamlico totes are art-to-wear on your shoulder! Each is a petite tote bag, hand-crafted acrylic paintings on canvas, with solid bottoms formed from reclaimed leathers. This is the bag for a day of errands. Pamlico is roomy enough to hold a full day’s essentials, yet elegant on the arm. The straps have a comfortable drop for every day use. A true one-of-a-kind bag, each Pamlico is fully lined with a brightly painted, natural cotton, and includes an inner pocket for small items or cell phone.

Please specify red, blue or purple when ordering. Other color pairings may be ordered.

Dimensions:
Strap
Length: 32"
Width: 3"

Body
Height: 14"
Width:  11"
Depth:   3"

Inside pocket
Width:   5"
Height:  4"

name: Loreena
description:
Loreena is a roomy, big, shoulder bag. Hand-crafted from reclaimed leathers that have been hand-painted with permanent paints, this bag is roomy enough to hold all your essentials, including books, business files or even your iPad. The strap is comfortable for all day use. The soft leather exterior, once a coat is constructed with a slide pocket in front.

A true one-of-a-kind bag, Loreena is fully lined with a vibrant hand-dyed natural cotton and includes an inner pocket for small items or cell phone.

This is an artwork that is meant to be worn!

Dimensions:

Strap
Length: 32"
Width: 3"

Body
Height: 16"
Width: 14"
Depth: 3"

Inside pocket
Width: 5"
Height: 4"

name: Nicole
description:
Nicole is a crazy-wonderful shoulder bag. Created from multiple recycled garments, Nicole is a splash of reds and blacks. The interior is lined with hand painted muslin, and fitted with a generous pocket. There are two outer pockets, the back includes a separate zippered pocket.

This is a bag that makes a statement while it carries all your goods!


Dimensions:

Strap 30"

Height: 12"
Width: 13"
Depth: 3"
